amendment.description: To clarify the use of GSA funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1943 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1943 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S13118; text: CR S13118) To clarify the use of GSA funds.
